She was subsequently attacked by SMS G 132 and another torpedo boat (both Kaiserliche Marine ) with the loss of fifteen of her 30 crew. The survivors were rescued by Royal Danish Navy torpedo boats. HMS E13 was later refloated but was declared beyond repair. She was scrapped in 1922.
